title: Deployment retry & troubleshooting documentation for failed network deploys

requirements.summary: Add an English deployment troubleshooting guide covering retrying failed IC network deploys and diagnosing common failures, referencing the existing canister availability ops guide.
acceptanceCriteria: A new markdown document exists in the repo that provides step-by-step instructions to retry deployment after a failure.
The guide includes a section listing common failure modes (build failure, identity/auth issues, canister stopped, out of cycles) and what to check next.
The guide references the existing canister availability operations guidance (frontend/OPS_CANISTER_AVAILABILITY.md) rather than duplicating it verbatim.
All user-facing/documentation text added is in English.

file_operations.description: Create a developer-facing English markdown guide describing how to retry a failed network deployment (including verifying canister status before redeploying) and how to diagnose common deployment failures (build failure, identity/auth issues, canister stopped, out-of-cycles). Include explicit references/links to frontend/OPS_CANISTER_AVAILABILITY.md for canister availability operations rather than duplicating that guidance.

Add a short English cross-reference pointing developers to frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md for deployment retry and broader failure-diagnosis steps, without duplicating troubleshooting content already covered in this ops guide.
